titleStmt.title: Ayme for Finsburie archers. Or An alphabeticall table of the names of euery marke within the same fields with their true distances according to the dimensuration of the line. Newly gathered, and amended by Iames Partridge.
titleStmt.author: Partridge, James.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. M[iller] for Iohn Partridge, and are to be sold at the signe of the Sunne in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Sunne in Pauls Church-yard
